content: Conexus is looking for teammates, especially in the UK, to continue a line of research applying pro-functors to safe AI by using them as the semantics of SQL queries in a project that verifies LLM-generated SQL code: see https://arxiv.org/abs/2404.01406 (published in ACT 2024) and http://sql.ai . The original authors (Josh, Gabriel, Emilio) are still leading the project but we're looking to potentially expand the team. Please contact me here or at ryan@conexus.com, thanks!
